text: hi everyone is Ellen here today I'm so
excited to inform you that my cookbook
has finally been published it's now
available involved as an e-book in a
printed book so you can click here now
to order your copy today what makes the
cookbook so special is that every recipe
in the book will come with a video
demonstration on YouTube Vietnamese
cuisine is one of the healthiest
cuisines in the world traditional
ingredients like cilantro lemongrass
mins or spanish are really good for you
and we also treasure the frottage of
ingredients and the balance of flavors
the book includes 62 most popular
Vietnamese dishes handpicked by myself
it is organized into six sections like
appetizers noodles the ship with rice
savory cakes sweet cakes and desserts
most of the Vietnamese dishes are lutein
free and dairy free so it's a perfect
choice for those of you who own those
diet before every recipe there's a
description of the dish sometimes my
commands or personal experience with
that dish to give it a little personal
touch I also provide very detailed lists
of ingredients and exact measurements in
both US and metric system most of the
recipes presented in this cookbook were
prepared when I lived in Germany so you
can trust that the ingredients are very
easy to find even in the western world
the side box tells you the cooking time
skew level category and which part of
Vietnam the dish comes from each recipe
comes with not only a photo of the final
dish but also photos for every step
instruction I also tried to include some
Street food photos of how the dish is
sold in Vietnam for some difficult
recipes I give you many tips to avoid
any pitfalls and enhance your chance of
success if all the photos and
instruction are still not clear enough
you just have to say hello and help me
take out your phone and scan your the
QR codes and I will instantly pop up to
have new father
if you still have questions you can
leave the comments under every video and
I will try my best to reply to your
questions as soon as possible to you
this function you just have to download
a QR reader app on your phone and it's
completely free you have no idea how
much time and effort I have spent of it
if I had know it myself I might not have
decided to make one but now I'm so glad
and so proud that I have finished the
cookbook and have it published so I hope
that you will get once you support all
my heart works and more importantly to
cook delicious Vietnamese homestyle meal
for your family and loved ones thank you
for watching my recipes
